Description: Tapestry fragment on single warp threads; a roundel in multi-coloured wools, containing floral and vegetal stylised motifs (leaves, flowers?) that extend from a central medallion in red and blue; the central decoration is surrounded by a freize/border of a geometrical motifs in mauve on a dark blue background; warp-undyed wool (S/9), weft-dark blue, mauve, pink, red, orange, yellow, green wool (all S/44); edges are hemmed and sewn
Curator's comments: similar to 62633 (part of the same piece) and an unreg textile (kept in R/19) mounted in glass; sewn on modern undyed, plain weave linen
